meanings.definition: A tough, wiry Mediterranean grass used for making ropes and baskets.
meanings.sent1: The villagers crafted sturdy baskets from esparto to carry their harvest.
meanings.sent2: The sailor relied on esparto ropes to secure the sails during the storm.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous goat got tangled in the esparto basket and hopped around comically.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as esparto, never bending under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The image of the sun setting over the field of golden esparto grass was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: A type of paper made from esparto grass.
meanings.sent1: The ancient scroll was written on esparto paper, preserving the wisdom of the past.
meanings.sent2: The artist sketched intricate designs on esparto paper, showcasing their talent.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used esparto paper to create a tiny hat and amused the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: Her words were as delicate as esparto paper, easily torn by criticism.
meanings.sent5: The texture of esparto paper felt like a gentle breeze against her fingertips.

meanings.definition: A plant of the grass family native to southern Europe and northern Africa.
meanings.sent1: In the botanical garden, the esparto plant stood tall among its companions.
meanings.sent2: The farmer admired the resilience of the esparto plant thriving in the arid soil.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit nibbled on the esparto plant and hopped away playfully.
meanings.sent4: Her roots were as deep as the esparto plant, firmly anchored in her heritage.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the esparto plant filled the air, a reminder of home.
